name: Valdamour
description:
Welcome to the haunted mansion of Valdamour

Valdamour is a fast paced, multiplayer asymmetric PvP where the exorcist player performs rituals in a haunted mansion, while the ghost player tries to stop him by using his arsenal of spooky abilities. Avoid the ghost's attempts at killing you before you can complete the final ritual and exorcise it for good.


• Both players have opposing goals and differing arsenals of abilities, requiring them to use their wit and a variety of tactics to outsmart the enemy player.

• Explore the randomly generated map in each and every match!

The Exorcist


The exorcist's goal is to complete various rituals around the haunted mansion, eventually leading to the last big ritual to exorcise the ghost for good.

An array of tools are available to reach his goal:

• The Lantern, allowing to see the ghost in its full form, or identify objects currently being haunted by it.

• The Talisman, granting you the ability to momentarily banish the ghost, or trap objects, to defend them from the ghost.


• The Key, allowing you to open doors in the mansion.

• The Booklet, giving you instructions towards your goal of the final exorcism.

The Ghost


The Ghost's goal is to either kill the exorcist, or stall him before he can complete the final ritual.
Around the house a variety of objects are scattered, ready to be haunted and controlled by the ghost to damage the player.
Additionally, the ghost has four spells in its arsenal to challenge the exorcist's endeavors:

•Decoy - spawns a misleading double in your place, if the exorcist sees it and tries to banish it, he will be punished.

•Lights Out - shuts off the lights for the entire mansion, spooking and confusing the exorcist.

•Sonar - immediately looks at the exorcist's position through walls, allowing the ghost to see his location in the mansion.

•Frenzy - Enter the Exorcist's body and immediately activate all lethal objects around him.
